fields.summary: Android: Complex/autogenerated remote image URLs fail, whereas simple URLs succeed
fields.environment:

Appcelerator Studio: 3.2.0.201311221207
SDK: 3.2.0.v20131125171956
acs:1.0.8
alloy:1.3.0-alpha6

titanium-code-processo:1.1.0-alpha
Device: Nexus 7 (v4.3)

comments.body:
Ran the test on the following devices & the results are below :
1.)Nexus 5 (4.4) -- Not reproducible
2.)Sony Experia (4.1.2) -- Not reproducible
3.)Samsung Galaxy S4 (4.2.2) -- Not reproducible
4.)Samsung Galaxy S3 (4.0.4) -- Not reproducible
5.)Nexus 7 (4.3) -- Not reproducible

I am able to see/get the image from the URL.

I am not sure what does "complex URL" means here, might be the query parameters in the url.

Environment:
Appcel Studio : 3.2.0.201311221207
Ti SDK : 3.2.0.v20131122172908
Mac OSX : 10.8.5
Alloy : 1.3.0-alpha6
CLI - 3.2.0-alpha3

Issue is not reproducible so marking same as Cannot reproduce. There were network issues yesterday which might be the reason. Verified with:
OSX: 10.8.5
Appcelerator Studio: 3.2.0.201311221207

alloy:1.3.0-alpha6
